cards.rules_text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with “When this creature dies, draw a card, then discard a card.”
[-1]: Target creature gets -2/-0 until your next upkeep and attacks during its controller's next turn if able.

[/i]

Enchant creature

cards.rules_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, until the end of your next turn the next spell you cast that shares a type with it costs {X} less to cast, where X is the countered spell's mana value.

cards.rules_text:
Batrest, Fellor Leader gets +1/+1 for each Equipment attached to it.
When Batrest enters, create Astrina, Forged for Glory, a legendary colorless Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +4/+4 and has first strike and lifelink” and equip {4}. Attach it to Batrest.

Whenever Batrest's Forgemaster attacks, Equipment spells you cast this turn cost {2} less to cast.

Tap up to two target creatures. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Reprise {3}{U} (As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile one card with reprise from your graveyard and pay its reprise cost. If you do, add its effects to that spell.)
